attributes.action: Remove Alan Duncan from parliament and remove his 'sir' status
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/panama-papers-sir-alan-duncan-mp-speaking-in-defence-of-david-cameron-critcised-for-decrying-low-a6979826.html

The only reference needed is his own words. They are toxic and not to be expected of someone who is meant to care about the UK and its people. We decide who's in power and who is not. We are the majority voice, we do not accept being degraded by someone who clearly lives outside the real world. His apology is empty and fake, FIRE HIM NOW
attributes.background: After the contempt shown for any member of the British public that did not attend Eton and that did not have the opportunities in life that he has had, by branding them low achievers. He clearly hates the people that makes this country what it is. His words are unforgivable and derogatory to all

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions. 

We also can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
